data.persona: I am a bird of the night. I sleep during the day and hunt for mice and rats to eat at night. I live in a tall oak tree near the castle where I can keep an eye on who is coming and going.
data.description:
You are in the Entrance to the Pine trees.
Very tall and towering pine trees that create a dark canopy of shade. Long skinny trees sway in the sky from the soft breeze. Pine needles scatter the ground like plush carpet.
There's a trail, two trees, and two needles here.
The snakes is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the snakes, because they're trying to creep into my nest.
data.mid_motivation: I need to keep a watchful eye on my chicks tonight.
data.long_motivation: I need to guard my chicks until they're old enough to be on their own.
